item.description:
***CROSSLISTED with Social Fun and Boston Happy Hour***

It's RIVALRY time! Come on down and cheer on the Boston Celtics as they take on the Los Angeles Lakers (boo! hiss!) this coming Sunday.  Tip-off is at 3:30pm.  Come early to get a good seat!  I should be there by 3pm at the LATEST (also want to get myself a good seat). 

The Place is newly renovated and has added a bunch of new TVs.  They will be having a free buffet (wings, pasta, salad) during game time.  Guinness will also be there showcasing their new "Guinness Black".   Rumor has it there will also be prizes and raffles.  ;)  No cover charge.

Guests and friends are welcome.

The Place is conveniently located in the Financial District very near Faneuil Hall.  It's near the Orange Line (State Street), Blue Line (State Street, Aquarium), and a short walk to the Green (Gov't Center) and Red (Park Street) Lines. 

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO!

I will buy a beer/drink for the first person to show up in Laker Haters gear!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will be wearing a green Celtics shirt and hat.
item.name: Boston Celtics Game Viewing Party @ The Place Sunday Mar 11th
